content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed price was 1000 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As the landlord, I am always aiming for the highest possible price. In this case, I achieved the initial asking price of 1000 Euros, so I would rate my satisfaction as a 10.
name: Peter Schmidt
